body:
I haven't made this official yet, but I think It's time too, after a lot of hard thought, I have decided to leave the server, and still for reasons I'm not very willing to discuss publicly, thank you for the amazing time this server has brought me, so many people have helped me grow in creativity, strength, confidence, and as a person, thank you for making me smile.

Have an amazing life, I wish the best of luck to you, the person reading this and the server, I'll miss you all, I'll still be on social medias and plugdj.

Goodbye Avicus, the happy memories and opportunities you gave to me will be forever remembered,

-HotCamTheMan/ MonsieurStar/ FlufflesSub
body_tagged:

Goodbye Avicus, the happy memories and opportunities you gave to me will be forever remembered,

-HotCamTheMan/ MonsieurStar/ FlufflesSub

replies.body:
Why is everyone leaving? :(

Fluffles, it's been a pleasure playing online with you and talking to you, remember the times we played SG all the time xd

Thank you for your contribution to the Dexterity team, as a leader and part of it, as well as being a very respected member of Avicus, as Staff etc.

Thanks for everything,

Myv, A.K.A _Za, iBiZa

replies.body:
Oh...
Cameron, you were by far one of my closest friends I've met on Avicus so far, we played together all the time and got pretty close c:, you even told me a song that ended up being my favorite.
Since you're leaving, I wish you the best of luck in life and have fun, no matter what :D



(btw, if you have no clue who I am, I'm Seuth xP)
